org.swat.server.game
Interface IGame

All Known Implementing Classes:
TicTacToe
public interface IGame

The interface to be implemented by every game

Author:
steve

Method Summary
 GameInfo getGameInfo()
          Get the information about this game
 GameState makeMove(GameState state, GameMove move)
          The main method of a game.
 

Method Detail

makeMove

GameState makeMove(GameState state,
                   GameMove move)
                   throws IllegalGameStateException,
                          IllegalMoveException
The main method of a game. This method must be re-entrant. This method must not save any local state.

Parameters:
state - the current state of the game
move - the move to make on the current state
Returns:
the new state of the game, after a valid move is made
Throws:
IllegalGameStateException
IllegalMoveException

getGameInfo

GameInfo getGameInfo()
Get the information about this game

Returns:
the information about this game
